nodes.text: Star Wars: Collector's Edition is a Borders exclusive volume that collects into one the three junior novelizations of the prequel trilogy by Patricia C. Wrede published by Scholastic: The Phantom Menace, Attack of the Clones, and Revenge of the Sith.
A long time ago in a galaxy far, far away....

Here, in one spectacular volume, is the trilogy that traces the path of Anakin Skywalker from a young slave to a chosen Jedi apprentice to his transformation into the infamous Sith Lord, Darth Vader. Relive every moment of the action-packed movies in this value-priced collector's edition!

Episode I: The Phantom Menace
Episode II: Attack of the Clones
Episode III: Revenge of the Sith
